features: Advanced materials deliver 2X anti-scratch defense for vivid screen clarity versus soda lime glass.
Anti-shatter/anti-scratch: fortified glass with surface hardness 9H — the highest level on the glass hardness scale
Incredibly quick, hassle-free installation which you can pair with an OtterBox case for total phone protection
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details)
body.description: Save your screen with crystal-clear Performance Glass. Flawless and fortified, shatter-resistant Performance Glass avoids scratches and splinters, so the vibrant display quality of your screen shines through. The ultra-thin tempered glass is engineered to endure with advanced, fortified material technology to withstand drops, impact and daily wear. Plus, it’s fingerprint resistant, so you can touch, tap and swipe while your screen stays smudge-free. All the tools you need are included for simple installation. With a limited lifetime warranty and hassle-free customer service, Performance Glass delivers advanced protection and peace of mind for your screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product & Great Deal!
reviews.reviewText: Was thrilled to find an Otterbox screen protector for an iPhone 11. So now my iPhone 11 has a new battery & a new glass protector. I did get annoyed when I saw high prices & then I saw that there were more moderately affordable protectors that were available.If you do not have a glass screen protector on your device, then your teachers did a terrible job in school. It’s common cents! Buy the protection to prevemt catastrophic consequences. (I know it’s “common sense” but here it really is about money, so common cents)Examples of common cents:- Condoms or kids or doctors appointments due to discharge?- Car insurance or loss of all money for rest of life?- Mobile phone screen and case protection or cost to replace mobile phone?Mobile phone replacement cost is…(You must choose option 1 or option 2):1. Cost of buying a brand new mobile phone at Full Price & using the same number everyone already has, or knows, in order to contact you.- OR -2. Cost is the loss of new job because companies with your application or resume on file cannot contact you with your new phone and new number. Plus the cost to your family, friends, Doctors Offices, and Utility Companies when can no longer be contacted when there is an emergency or use you as an Emergency Contact when they are in trouble, or they are suffering from a medical or non-medical emergency, or they are severely injured and need your help. All because you think “If it breaks I will just get a new mobile phone and new number.”Number 2 IS HOW RICH PEOPLE THINK BECAUSE THEY HAVE STAFF TO CARE FOR THEM, AND THEIR FAMILIES, AND THEIR FRIENDS.YOUR PHONE NUMBER SHOULD NOT CHANGE! YOU SHOULD KEEP YOUR NUMBER FOR AS LONG AS YOU CAN IN LIFE. WHEN YOUR NUMBER CHANGES YOU AND YOUR FAMILY AND YOUR FRIENDS LOOSE.The mobile phone companies do not make you get a new number. Your carelessness of your mobile phone forced you to replace it. You decided to get a new number to replace what you broke due to mobile phone cost.All you had to do was buy a glass screen protector and case. Common cents!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far it’s great
reviews.reviewText: This comes with everything you need to install the screen protector in the best way! A wipe, cloth, a thing to hold the phone in place a little card to press down the glass once its on. I gave this 4 stars and not 5 because: 1. I don’t know how good this is, just got it today. 2. There is a bubble on the top of my screen I cannot get out and I know it will drive me crazy before I get used to it…

reviews.reviewText: I will buy this every time. These go on so much easier than the cheaper ones. Without air bubbles. Every.single.time.Well worth the couple extra dollars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect as described Superfast shipping Great seller!!!
reviews.reviewText: Everything is of superb quality, sturdy & Firm. Not easy to line up and install perfectly. It could just be me. The upper right corner would not adhere and stay down. The holder would not lock and stay put to hold the iphone 11 in place. Like I said it may just be me my first time doing this with a separate glass screen cover. My cases usually have the screen cover already installed. No reflection on the seller whatsoever

Comes with everything you need to instal except how to install it. Every product has its way to install the screen protector and didn't have a manuel. Went to youtube for help. Apart from that it is very sturdy. My boyfriend is a mechanic and we needed something real good for his day-to-day life and that does it real good. The applicator is amazing. Protector does not go all the way to the end but if you have and otterbox case there wont be space left.

reviews.reviewTitle: Must Buy for your phone protection
reviews.reviewText: It is a high quality product. Must buy to save your expensive phone
Très satisfaite de min achat, on ne le remarque pas, très bonne transparence

I hesitated on buying the clear case because I thought it would look scratched up in no time. I have been using it now for a few months and yes it is showing scratches. I still like it but doubt it will still look good by end of the year. That being said I like that I can customize it with my own picture and Otterbox covers are so durable and really protect your phone as I have learned from past experiences with them. Generally happy with my purchase.
